si.title: අද මුදල් විනිමය අනුපාතය
body_lines: The US dollar purchasing price was Rs 307.7088 and the sales price were 317.2528 based on the currency exchange rate released by the Central Bank on Monday (February 05).

en.title: Today's currency exchange rate

summary_lines: The US dollar's purchase price was Rs 307.7088, and the sales price was Rs 317.2528, as per the Central Bank's Monday (February 05) release.
